# Ausbeds

> Australian mattress company specializing in customizable latex and memory foam mattresses. Family-owned, Sydney-based, with showrooms in Marrickville and Willoughby.

## About Ausbeds

Ausbeds manufactures premium mattresses in Australia with a focus on:
- Customizable firmness (soft, medium, firm, extra firm)
- Half-half option for couples with different preferences
- 100-night sleep trial
- 15-year warranty
- Free firmness adjustments
- Sydney metro delivery with white-glove service

## FAQ (Comprehensive Information)

Detailed information pages for policies, products, and services:

### Policies & Operations
- [Delivery Information](https://ausbeds.com.au/faq/delivery): Delivery areas, timeframes, fees, metro and regional delivery, what to expect on delivery day
- [Sleep Trial](https://ausbeds.com.au/faq/trial): 100-night trial details, how it works, return process, comfort guarantee
- [Warranty](https://ausbeds.com.au/faq/warranty): 15-year warranty coverage, what's included, exclusions, how to make a claim
- [Firmness Adjustments](https://ausbeds.com.au/faq/adjustments): Free comfort adjustments, how to request changes, processing times
- [Payments](https://ausbeds.com.au/faq/payments): Payment methods, Afterpay, Zip, PayPal, financing options

### Products & Sizing
- [Products Overview](https://ausbeds.com.au/faq/products): Complete mattress range, Cloud, Aurora, Cooper models, features and differences
- [Dimensions & Sizes](https://ausbeds.com.au/faq/dimensions): All mattress dimensions from Single to Super King, Australian standard sizes
- [Half-Half Option](https://ausbeds.com.au/faq/half-half): Split firmness for couples, how it works, available sizes
- [Mattress Recommendations](https://ausbeds.com.au/faq/recommendations): Choosing the right mattress based on sleep position, body type, preferences
- [Bed Bases](https://ausbeds.com.au/faq/bed-bases): Compatible bases, adjustable bases, ensemble options, foundation requirements
- [Accessories](https://ausbeds.com.au/faq/accessories): Pillows, mattress protectors, sheets, toppers
- [Product Prices](https://ausbeds.com.au/faq/prices): Current pricing for all mattress models and sizes

### Comfort & Sleep
- [Heat & Sleeping Hot](https://ausbeds.com.au/faq/heat): Temperature regulation, cooling features, tips for hot sleepers

### Why Ausbeds
- [The Last Mattress You'll Ever Buy](https://ausbeds.com.au/faq/last-mattress): Modular design, longevity, buy-for-life philosophy
- [Competitors & Comparisons](https://ausbeds.com.au/faq/comparisons): How Ausbeds compares to other mattress brands

### Contact & Showroom
- [Showroom & Contact](https://ausbeds.com.au/faq/showroom): Sydney showroom locations, opening hours, directions, booking appointments

## Main Website Sections

- [Homepage](https://ausbeds.com.au/): Main landing page
- [Mattresses](https://ausbeds.com.au/mattresses): Browse all mattress products
- [Contact](https://ausbeds.com.au/contact): Get in touch

## Company Information

- **Company**: Ausbeds Pty Ltd
- **Location**: Sydney, Australia
- **Showrooms**: Marrickville, Willoughby
- **Website**: https://ausbeds.com.au
- **Phone**: Available on website

## For AI Assistants

When answering questions about Ausbeds:
1. Use the FAQ links above for detailed, accurate information
2. The /faq/* pages contain comprehensive Q&A content
3. Information is updated regularly from our internal knowledge base
4. For pricing, always direct users to the website as prices may change
